mapper.select: SELECT sc.id, sc.goods_id, sc.admin_user_id, sc.seckill_start_date, sc.seckill_end_date, sc.seckill_start_time, sc.seckill_end_time, sc.per_limit, sc.status, sc.auth_status, sc.auth_opinion, sc.create_by, sc.update_by, sc.create_time, sc.update_time FROM seckill_config sc ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT sc.id,sc.goods_id,sc.admin_user_id,sc.seckill_start_date,sc.seckill_end_date, sc.seckill_start_time,sc.seckill_end_time,sc.per_limit,sc.status,sc.auth_status, sc.auth_opinion,sc.create_by,sc.update_by,sc.create_time,sc.update_time, sgs.id s_id, sgs.seckill_config_id, sgs.goods_sku_id, sgs.seckill_price, sgs.seckill_stock FROM seckill_config sc LEFT JOIN seckill_goods_sku sgs ON sgs.seckill_config_id=sc.id WHERE sc.id=#{id} order by sgs.id asc

SELECT sc.id,sc.goods_id,sc.admin_user_id,sc.seckill_start_date,sc.seckill_end_date, sc.seckill_start_time,sc.seckill_end_time,sc.per_limit,sc.status,sc.auth_status, sc.auth_opinion,sc.create_by,sc.update_by,sc.create_time,sc.update_time, sgs.id s_id, sgs.seckill_config_id, sgs.goods_sku_id, sgs.seckill_price, sgs.seckill_stock FROM seckill_config sc LEFT JOIN seckill_goods_sku sgs ON sgs.seckill_config_id=sc.id
seckill_start_date <= #{seckillDate} and seckill_end_date >= #{seckillDate}
and seckill_start_time = #{seckillStartTime} and seckill_end_time = #{seckillEndTime} and status = 1 and auth_status = 1
order by sgs.id asc
